date1.description: Enter the first harvest or grazing date

interval.description: Enter the intervals between harvest or grazing (days)

script.name: end_of_day
script.text: account = account + 1 if ( (today = date('[date1]')) or (today >date('[date1]') and account = [interval] ) ) then account = 0 '[AgPasture]' graze type = '[amount_type]', amount = [amount] (kg/ha) endif

manager.name: Cut and remove on fixed dates (no return)

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
if (today = date('[date1]') ) then '[AgPasture]' graze type = '[type]', amount = [amount] endif
if (today = date('[date2]') ) then '[AgPasture]' graze type ='[type]', amount =[amount] endif

date1.description: Enter the first harvest or grazing date

interval.description: Enter the intervals between harvest or grazing (days)

dm_frac.description: Fraction of nitrogen returned as excreta

urine_n_frac.description: Fraction of returned nitrogen in urine

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
account = account + 1 dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 = 0 n_urine2 = 0 if ( (today = date('[date1]')) or (today >date('[date1]') and account = [interval] )) then account = 0 '[AgPasture]' graze type = '[amount_type]', amount = [amount] (kg/ha) digest = DefoliatedDigestibility dm_som = HarvestWt * (1-digest)
n_removed = HarvestN *(1.0-[dm_frac]) n_returned = HarvestN * [dm_frac] n_som = n_returned * ( 1.0 - [urine_n_frac] ) n_urine = n_returned * [urine_n_frac] n_urine1 = 0.6 * n_urine n_urine2 = 0.4 * n_urine 'Surface Organic Matter' add_surfaceom name = '[AgPasture]' , type = grass, mass = dm_som (kg/ha), n = n_som (kg/ha) 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine1 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = urea_n () 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine2 (kg/ha), depth = 150 (mm), type = urea_n () endif

manager.name: Harvest or grazing on fixed dates (with return)

dm_frac.description: Fraction of nitrogen returned as excreta

urine_n_frac.description: Fraction of returned nitrogen in urine

urine_depth.description: Depth of returned nitrogen in soil profile (mm)

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
dm_som = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 = 0 n_urine2 = 0 if (today = date('[date1]')) or (today = date('[date2]')) or (today = date('[date3]'))then '[AgPasture]' graze type = '[amount_type]', amount = [amount] (kg/ha) digest = DefoliatedDigestibility dm_som = HarvestWt * (1-digest)
n_removed = HarvestN *(1.0-[dm_frac]) n_returned = HarvestN * [dm_frac] n_som = n_returned * ( 1.0 - [urine_n_frac] ) n_urine = n_returned * [urine_n_frac] n_urine1 = 0.6 * n_urine n_urine2 = 0.4 * n_urine 'Surface Organic Matter' add_surfaceom name = '[AgPasture]' , type = grass, mass = dm_som (kg/ha), n = n_som (kg/ha) 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine1 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = urea_n () 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine2 (kg/ha), depth = 150 (mm), type = urea_n () endif

manager.name: Rotational grazing with herbage mass between two limits

date1.description: Enter the first harvest or grazing date

upper_amount.description: Enter herbage anmount to start grazing (harvest) (kg/ha)

amount.description: Enter daily amount (kg/ha) or -1 for remove once to residee below

lower_amount.description: Enter herbage amount to stop grazing (residue, kg/ha)

dm_frac.description: Fraction of nitrogen returned as excreta

urine_n_frac.description: Fraction of returned nitrogen in urine

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 = 0 n_urine2 = 0
if ( today >= date('[date1]') ) then if ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[upper_amount]' ) or ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[lower_amount]') and (continuegrazing = 1) ) ) then removable_amt = [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt - [lower_amount] if ([amount] = -1 ) or ('[amount]' > removable_amt ) then daily_amt = removable_amt continuegrazing = 0 else daily_amt = [amount] continuegrazing= 1 endif
'[AgPasture]' graze type = 'removal', amount = daily_amt (kg/ha) digest = DefoliatedDigestibility dm_som = HarvestWt * (1-digest) n_removed = HarvestN *(1.0-[dm_frac]) n_returned = HarvestN * [dm_frac] n_som = n_returned * ( 1.0 - [urine_n_frac] ) n_urine = n_returned * [urine_n_frac] n_urine1 = 0.6 * n_urine n_urine2 = 0.4 * n_urine 'Surface Organic Matter' add_surfaceom name = '[AgPasture]' , type = grass, mass = dm_som (kg/ha), n = n_som (kg/ha) 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine1 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = urea_n () 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine2 (kg/ha), depth = 150 (mm), type = urea_n () endif endif

script.name: init
script.text: account = 0 dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 continuegrazing = 1 daily_amt = 0

manager.name: Rotation grazing with herbage mass between two limits-clover

date1.description: Enter the first harvest or grazing date

upper_amount.description: Enter herbage anmount to start grazing (harvest) (kg/ha)

amount.description: Enter daily amount (kg/ha) or -1 for remove once to residee below

lower_amount.description: Enter herbage amount to stop grazing (residue, kg/ha)

dm_frac.description: Fraction of nitrogen returned as excreta

urine_n_frac.description: Fraction of returned nitrogen in urine

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
dm_som = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 = 0 n_urine2 = 0
if ( today >= date('[date1]') ) then if ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[upper_amount]' ) or ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[lower_amount]') and (continuegrazing = 1) ) ) then removable_amt = [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt - [lower_amount] if ([amount] = -1 ) or ('[amount]' > removable_amt ) then daily_amt = removable_amt continuegrazing = 0 else daily_amt = [amount] continuegrazing= 1 endif
'[AgPasture]' graze type = 'removal', amount = daily_amt (kg/ha)
digest = DefoliatedDigestibility dm_som = HarvestWt * ([1-digest)
n_removed = [AgPasture].HarvestN *(1-[dm_frac]) n_returned = [AgPasture].HarvestN * [dm_frac] n_som = n_returned* ( 1 - [urine_n_frac] ) n_urine = n_returned * [urine_n_frac] n_urine1 = 0.6 * n_urine n_urine2 = 0.4 * n_urine 'Surface Organic Matter' add_surfaceom name = '[AgPasture]' , type = grass, mass = dm_som (kg/ha), n = n_som (kg/ha) 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine1 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = urea_n () 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine2 (kg/ha), depth = 150 (mm), type = urea_n () endif endif

script.name: init
script.text: account = 0 dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 continuegrazing = 1 daily_amt = 0

manager.name: Rotation grazing with herbage mass between two limits-ryegrass

date1.description: Enter the first harvest or grazing date

upper_amount.description: Enter herbage anmount to start grazing (harvest) (kg/ha)

amount.description: Enter daily amount (kg/ha) or -1 for remove once to residee below

lower_amount.description: Enter herbage amount to stop grazing (residue, kg/ha)

dm_frac.description: Fraction of nitrogen returned as excreta

urine_n_frac.description: Fraction of returned nitrogen returned in urine

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 = 0 n_urine2 = 0
if ( today >= date('[date1]') ) then if ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[upper_amount]' ) or ( ( [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt > '[lower_amount]') and (continuegrazing = 1) ) ) then removable_amt = [AgPasture].AboveGroundWt - [lower_amount] if ([amount] = -1 ) or ('[amount]' > removable_amt ) then daily_amt = removable_amt continuegrazing = 0 else daily_amt = [amount] continuegrazing= 1 endif
'[AgPasture]' graze type = 'removal', amount = daily_amt (kg/ha) dm_som = HarvestWt * ([1-digest)
n_removed = [AgPasture].HarvestN *(1-[dm_frac]) n_returned = [AgPasture].HarvestN * [dm_frac] n_som = n_returned* ( 1 - [urine_n_frac] ) n_urine = n_returned * [urine_n_frac] n_urine1 = 0.6 * n_urine n_urine2 = 0.4 * n_urine 'Surface Organic Matter' add_surfaceom name = '[AgPasture]' , type = grass, mass = dm_som (kg/ha), n = n_som (kg/ha) 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine1 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = urea_n () 'fertiliser' apply amount = n_urine2 (kg/ha), depth = 150 (mm), type = urea_n () endif endif

script.name: init
script.text: account = 0 dm_som = 0 dm_removed = 0 n_returned =0 n_removed =0 n_som = 0 n_urine = 0 n_urine1 =0 n_urine2 = 0 continuegrazing = 1 daily_amt = 0

manager.name: Sow pasture on a fixed date

pasture.description: Enter name of pasture to sow :

manager.name: End pasture on a fixed date

crop.description: Enter name of pasture to end:

script.name: end_of_day
script.text: if (today = date('[date]') then [crop] KillCrop KillFracion = 0 endif
